rows.label: qst702303_msg0001
rows.name:
This man is carrying a
Shiyan cipher machine.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0002
rows.name: ...I see. A spy.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0003
rows.name:
A Superbian colluding with
Shiya... He deserves to
die a thousand deaths.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait, you mean you weren't
chasing me because you knew?!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0005
rows.name: No one said anything of the sort...

rows.label: qst702303_msg0006
rows.name:
The Superbian army is capturing
remnants of Shiya's forces who
are looting various places.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0007
rows.name:
He likely tried to flee, thinking
he would be exposed... Something
like that, I presume.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0008
rows.name:
...Thanks for the kind explanation!
But are you sure you can afford
to be so complacent?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0009
rows.name:
If you're busy playing
friends, you'll be swept
off your feet again! Haha!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0010
rows.name:
Your bravado is admirable,
but shouldn't you act with
a bit more caution?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Hmph! I won't be lectured by
some foolish Iiran prince!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0012
rows.name: Adel, would you leave this to me?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0013
rows.name:
I don't mind... but what
do you plan to do?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0014
rows.name: Kagutsuchi. Wadatsumi.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0015
rows.name:
We cannot let a spy live. Dispose of
him thoroughly, leaving no trace.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0016
rows.name:
Wait, you don't mean... You're
not serious, are you?!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0017
rows.name: ...Sorry. Laura, please look away.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0018
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Aaaargh!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0019
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Th-this humiliation!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0020
rows.name: He struggled, so it took some time.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0021
rows.name:
A fine job, Kagutsuchi.
Have you been practicing?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0022
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Are you kidding me?! What is this?!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0023
rows.name:
I told you, did I not? We
cannot let a spy live.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0024
rows.name:
From this day forth, you are
forbidden to call yourself
Meknes. He will disappear today.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0025
rows.name:
Hah, you want me to become
someone else? This is insane!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0026
rows.name:
Don't worry. You look
lovely from every angle.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0027
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Stop it! Don't console me!
That's not what I mean!

rows.label: qst702303_msg0028
rows.name: Silence.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0029
rows.name:
You insulted not only my country, but my
friend as well. Did you think I would
overlook it? You're lucky to have your head.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0030
rows.name:
...I didn't mention it, but Hugo
is very scary when he's angry.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0031
rows.name:
I don't know if your employer
is Shiyan, or someone else
trying to frame them.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0032
rows.name:
What I do know is that a spy
who has fallen into enemy hands
will not be left as is.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0034
rows.name:
From now on, you will live as Adel's
subordinate. In that form, you should
be able to serve as a decent disguise.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0035
rows.name: ...You're trying to help me?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0036
rows.name:
Everyone has their role. I
simply want you to do your job.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0037
rows.name: Adel, can I leave the rest to you?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0038
rows.name:
Leave it to me. I'll prepare a
place for him in the capital.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0039
rows.name:
So you've neatly increased
your own forces?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0040
rows.name:
If that were my intention,
I'd have done it better.
There are other prisoners.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0041
rows.name:
His information may be
useful one day. That's why
I entrusted him to Adel.

rows.label: qst702303_msg0042
rows.name:
Well, anyway, we have
to report this, but...

rows.label: qst702303_msg0043
rows.name:
How about we say he was
unfortunately found by a
ferocious monster and lost his life?

rows.label: qst702303_msg0044
rows.name: Hugo... your smile is terrifying.
